assignFloatingIP

void assignFloatingIP(String instanceIPAddress,
                      String floatingIP,
                      Map<String,Object> context)
                      throws RemoteNetworkOperationException,
                             TimeoutException
Assigns a floating IP address to the dedicated instance.

Parameters:
instanceIPAddress - The dedicated instance IP address.
floatingIP - The floating IP address.
context - context properties.
Throws:
RemoteNetworkOperationException - If assign action fails.
TimeoutException - If execution exceeds duration.

allocateFloatingIP

String allocateFloatingIP(String poolName,
                          Map<String,Object> context)
                          throws RemoteNetworkOperationException,
                                 TimeoutException
Reserves a floating IP address from the available blocks of floating IP addresses.

Parameters:
poolName - The pool name from which to allocate the floating IP address.
context - context properties.
Returns:
The reserved IP address.
Throws:
RemoteNetworkOperationException - If allocation fails.
TimeoutException - If execution exceeds duration.
